title: Analysis of Reviews
text:
Top 20








Figure 2: Top 20 interventions, according to their overall score (the combined weighted averages of the three reviewers). The line shows the range of reviews, from the lowest to the highest of the three scores. In colors are the average scores (not weighted) of the category-specific ratings of the three reviewers.

title: Analysis of Reviews
text:
By reviewer








Figure 3: Distribtions of reviewer scores (weighted averages of the different rating categories). Each dot corresponds to a review. Lines with dot in the middle (above the boxplots) represent the reviewer specific means and their 95% CIs.

title: Analysis of Reviews
text:
By content








Figure 4: Distribtions of reviewer scores (weighted averages of the different rating categories) by content label. Each dot corresponds to a review. Lines with dot in the middle (above the boxplots) represent the specific means of the respective content labels, and their 95% CIs.

title: Analysis of Reviews
text:
All








Figure 5: All interventions, according to their overall score (the combined weighted averages of the three reviewers). The line shows the range of reviews, from the lowest to the highest of the three scores. In colors are the the category-specific averages (not weighted) of the three reviewers.
